channel.title: [317 - DELTA] Skill Cape Shop [Rep++]
channel.description:
I was wondering if anyone know's how to make it if a player trades the skill cape shop it only shows the cape's that player has acquired the level of 99 in?
So if he has 99 in attack, attack cape will show. So if he has 99 in strength, strength cape will show. So if he has 99 in prayer, prayer cape will show.
So if he has 98 in attack, attack cape [b]will not[/b] show. So if he has 91 in strength, strength cape [b]will not[/b] show. So if he has 49 in prayer, prayer cape [b]will not[/b] show.
Rep++ for any help!

item.title: [317 - DELTA] Skill Cape Shop [Rep++]
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

I was wondering if anyone know’s how to make it if a player trades the skill cape shop it only shows the cape’s that player has acquired the level of 99 in?

So if he has 99 in attack, attack cape will show. So if he has 99 in strength, strength cape will show. So if he has 99 in prayer, prayer cape will show.
So if he has 98 in attack, attack cape [b]will not[/b] show. So if he has 91 in strength, strength cape [b]will not[/b] show. So if he has 49 in prayer, prayer cape [b]will not[/b] show.

Rep++ for any help!
